DOC.brief_summary: Airway dendritic cell ( DCs ) play key role smoke-related lung disease . In study , researcher investigate effect fluticasone salmeterol human airway DCs smoker . The researcher hypothesize fluticasone salmeterol impact number characteristic airway DCs smoker .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Fluticasone Salmeterol Airway Dendritic Cells ( DCs ) Smokers
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Men age 30 60 year At least 15 year smoke Current smoker , least 10 cigarette per day Any acute chronic disease ( except COPD oder hypertension ) Any regular medication ( except drug hypertension ) FEV1 < 80 % predict Oxygen saturation < 90 % Acute infection low respiratory tract last 7 day first day study
